name: GyroMojo LLC
about: GyroMojo LLC is a specialized flying school dedicated to providing comprehensive gyroplane flight training. Based in Frederick, MD, we offer a range of programs from introductory discovery flights to commercial certification. Our certified flight instructors provide personalized training, including dual and solo flight hours, to ensure students achieve all gyroplane ratings from Sport Pilot to Commercial. We utilize the AutoGyro MTO Sport for our training, and our instructors are experienced in various gyroplane models. With a focus on safety and proficiency, GyroMojo LLC is committed to helping aspiring pilots transition into their own aircraft and navigate various airspace conditions. We welcome students from all skill levels and backgrounds, making gyroplane flight accessible and enjoyable. Join us to experience the unique joys of gyroplane aviation.
